title: Silk merchant

properties.value: The Silk merchant is a non-player character in East Ardougne and Great Kourend that buys silk. Selling silk to the East Ardougne Silk merchant for 60 coins is a requirement for the Easy Ardougne Diary. Silk cannot be sold to him by players who recently stole from his stall. The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Silk merchantThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Silk merchant
This article is about the merchant in East Ardougne and Great Kourend. For the trader in Al Kharid, see Silk trader.
 This article has a money making guide: Selling silk to silk merchant.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.
Silk merchant
Released30 April 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationEast Ardougne, Great Kourend
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineSeems very well-off.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3211,4583

The Silk merchant is a non-player character in East Ardougne and Great Kourend that buys silk. Selling silk to the East Ardougne Silk merchant for 60 coins is a requirement for the Easy Ardougne Diary. Silk cannot be sold to him by players who recently stole from his stall. The silk merchant will remember thieves for 10 minutes since last stealing from the silk stall, time spent while logged out does not count.

The price that each silk is worth can be bargained through the merchant's dialogue. The best price is 60 coins, which is accessed by first offering 120 and then countering the merchant's offer of 50 coins. Other possible sell values are 20, 40, or 50 coins each. After the price is decided, the merchant will buy all silks in the inventory at the same time.

Note: The silk Merchant will not buy noted silk.
